Class LexicalAnalyser

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class LexicalAnalyser
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LexicalAnalyser(java.lang.String fileName)
      Creates a new LexicalAnalyser which will run over the given file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LexicalAnalyser

        public LexicalAnalyser(java.lang.String fileName)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new LexicalAnalyser which will run over the given file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The file to read.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any read errors occur during parsing.

    • Method Detail

      • getFilename

        public java.lang.String getFilename()
        Simply returns the current loaded input file name

      • getNextToken

        public Token getNextToken()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the next token from the source file. Repeatedly calling this will return each token in the file, and eventually null.
        Returns:
        the next token from the source file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in the event that the file cannot be read.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Entry point to text Lexer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
